陷.definition: pitfall; trap; to get stuck; to sink; to cave in; to frame (false charge); to capture (a city in battle); to fall (to the enemy); defect

陷入.definition: to sink into; to get caught up in; to land in (a predicament)

陷入牢籠.definition: to fall into a trap; ensnared

陷害.definition: to entrap; to set up; to frame (up); to make false charges against

陷於.definition: caught in (a bad situation); to fall into (trap etc)

陷於癱瘓.definition: to be paralyzed; to come to a standstill

陷落.definition: to surrender (of a fortress); to fall (to the enemy); subsidence (of land)
